oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Successful concepts for building beef practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Perrett, Tye
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cattle
beef
practice management
animal health
beef cattle
cattle farming
decision making
farm management
feedlots
profitability
sustainability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: While there is not a universally accepted definition describing complete success for beef practices, the aim of this paper is to outline 10 concepts that have been important to the success of Feedlot Health Management Services Ltd. These 10 tools provide a framework for beef practice owners to specifically define success for their practice and customize a plan for accomplishing that objective.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: The Bovine Practitioner; Vol. 49, No. 2 (2015 Summer); 159-162
